query: core_product_name: plate electrode earthing station | size: inspection chamber: 400(L)x400(W)x450(D)mm, thickness: 150 mm, copper plate: 600x600x3mm, GI line: 15 mm, watering line: 50 mm, connecting clamps: 3 meter length | feature_or_specifications: standard: IS3043(indian standard 3043) - 2018, NBC 2016(national building code 2016), inspection chamber: block work with CI( cast iron) cover/lid, copper plate, GI(galvanized iron) line/funnel, CI frame and cover, salt & charcoal mixture, M10 bolts & nuts, universal stainless steel clamps, 75x6 Cu. strips, brass bolts & nuts, excavation and back filling around the plate
